body:
Misty: Ash what are you doing?

Pervert: I'm gonna rip you up.

Me: *picks him up* Hello "Ash".

Pervert: Uh-oh.

Me: Misty go find Ash.  He's with Brock in the Pokémon Center.

Misty: Thank you.

Pervert: No!

Me: You know what I really hate?

Pervert: When someone steals your girl.

Me: When someone imitates my brother and uses it to mess with my FRIENDS! *beats him up*

Pervert: *painful groans*
